text: Ilamura Thamburan is a 1998 Indian Malayalam-language film directed by Hari Kudappanakkunnu and starring Manoj K. Jayan and Vani Viswanath in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Manoj K. Jayan as Anadapadmanabhan Thamburan / Unni * Sindhu as Indira * Thilakan as Chandu Nair * Vijayakumar as Chandran * Vani Viswanath as Urmila *Kochu Preman as Kunjunni Nair * Kalabhavan Mani as Kumaran * Pala Aravindan as Achuthan Nair * Lakshmi Krishnamurthy as Subhadrama * Reena as Devikikunjamma *Kannur Sreelatha as Vilasini *Kaladharan as Ottakomban Parameswaran *Kollam Ajith as Bhargavan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Ilamura Thamburan
